meanings.definition: To achieve victory or success in a competition or game.
meanings.sent1: She was wonning the race with determination.
meanings.sent2: The team wonning the championship celebrated joyfully.
meanings.sent3: His wonning of the chess match surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The underdog kept wonning against all odds.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of wonning filled her with pride.

meanings.definition: The act of achieving victory or success.
meanings.sent1: Her wonning in the tournament was well-deserved.
meanings.sent2: The crowd cheered at the team's wonning.
meanings.sent3: The wonning of the spelling bee brought smiles all around.
meanings.sent4: The wonning of the lottery changed his life forever.
meanings.sent5: The wonning of the award was a highlight of her career.

meanings.sent2: She felt proud of her wonning performance.
meanings.sent3: His wonning smile showed his happiness.
meanings.sent4: The wonning athletes were honored at the ceremony.
meanings.sent5: The wonning feeling lingered long after the game.
